wikipedia_page.main: Albert Henry Tomkin (23 December 1915 – 3 September 1989) was an English professional footballer who played for Formby, Tottenham Hotspur and Northfleet United, and wartime matches for Southport, Cardiff City, Swansea City and Luton Town.

response: *Albert Tomkin began his career at Formby before moving to Tottenham Hotspur in 1937.
* Albert Tomkin – former outside left player for Tottenham Hotspur
